description.narrative: Danida Innovation & Business Explorer (DIBE) offers financial support to Danish companies, including start-ups, that wish to investigate concrete business opportunities contributing to the achievement of the Sustainable Development Goals and the Paris agreement. ) Our aim is to explore ways to scale up our fortification efforts to help address the unfortunate prevalence of IDA in developing countries throughout the world and halt the negative impact it has on the cognitive development and hence education of children and adolescents, hampering societal development in countries that need it the most. We hope that we can develop partnerships with government programs and the local industry Ghana. It is our goal to develop fortified application solutions for the local food industry and finished products for prevention used in school programs that hopefully can lead to effective anemia intervention strategies and solutions. In regard to products we will focus on pre-mixes for fortifying flour and fortified cookies. Our core target group is children and pregnant women
Heme-iron food fortification on school food programs for fighting iron deficiency anemia in Ghana.
